name: @agikit-slim/examples
description: Example AGI games for testing and demonstration

scripts.build: echo 'No build needed for examples package'
scripts.build-and-zip:eng: agikit build eng && cd eng/build && zip -r ../../eng-agi.zip .
scripts.build-and-zip:heb: agikit build heb --encoding windows-1255 && cd heb/build && zip -r ../../heb-agi.zip .
